text: neohui gaunde hananim-ui eunhye leul boda manh-i badneun jaga issnani sigihaji malla namseong-eun geudeul-i eod eun geos gaundeseo mogs-i issgo yeoseongdogeudeul-i eod-eun geos gaundeseo mogs-i issnani seololeul sigihaji malmyeo hana nimkke guwonhala hananim-eun modeun il e jeonjijeonneunghasim-ila
